pages.text: This powerful relic is obtained by defeating $(l:bewitchment:creatures/leonard)Leonard$().$(br2)It can be combined with a Splash Potion, which can then be thrown four times using the Scepter at the cost of $(l:bewitchment:introduction/altars#internalme)ME$().$(br2)The Scepter can be repaired using Netherie Ingots.
